name: TeleGames
overview: TeleGames is a collection of three classic board games to be played against a remote opponent via modem or null-modem. It can also be played taking turns at the same computer. The games in question are chess, checkers and backgammon. The graphics are colourful, and can be seen both in 3-d from several perspectives as well as in a flat view from straight above. The package contains a phone book to keep track of remote opponents.
